articles.title: Congratulations to Indonesian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Indonesian President
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono upon his reelection as President of Indonesia.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Indonesia would continue to develop in the future, too, Kim in the message sincerely wished the president greater success in the work for stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Congolese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Congolese President
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Denis Sassou Nguesso, President of Congo, on the 49th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the president, government and people of Congo successes in their work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the All-China Women's Federation headed by its Vice-President Zhen Yan at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
					 The head of the delegation said that the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship provided by revolutionaries of the elder generation is growing stronger under the deep care of General Secretary Hu Jintao and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 She said that it was an event to be specially recorded in the history of the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations that  Kim Jong Il appreciated opera "The Dream of the Red Chamber" and drama "A Sentry under a Neon Lamp". 
					
					 She expressed belief that the exchange and cooperation between the two countries would become more brisk in various fields.
					
					 She expressed the conviction that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the Korean people would open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, by intensifying the drive for bringing about a great revolutionary surge.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the All-China Women's Federation.
					 The gift was handed to Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Friday by its Vice-President Zhen Yan on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Japanese Delegation
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Japanese Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by the visiting delegation of the Japanese Youth Society for the Study of the Juche Idea. 
					 It was handed to an official concerned on Friday by Nobuaki Endo, head of its delegation.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Settle All Its Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Settle All Its Crimes
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee on Measures for Compensation to Former Korean "Comfort Women" for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims issued a statement on Aug. 14 64 years since the defeat of the Japanese imperialists.
					 The statement said: Many people were forced to suffer all sorts of shame and sufferings after being taken as sexual slaves for the Japanese imperialist aggressor troops, slave laborers and as cannon fodder in the past and they still have their grudges unsettled. Young people are subject to physical sufferings resulting from the chemical weapons carelessly left by the Japanese imperialists in different parts of Asia. A large number of people who had been taken by the Japanese imperialists to alien countries at the point of the bayonet have undergone unbearable misfortune for several decades, without knowing the whereabouts of their kith and kin. 
					
					 This being hard realities, the Japanese authorities are behaving impudently, oft-repeating their far-fetched assertion that the issue of Japan's settlement of its past had already been solved legally though neither victims nor the international community recognize it.
					
					 The Japanese authorities have persistently evaded the responsibility to make apology and reparation to Korea, the biggest victim of the Japanese imperialists, though more than six decades have passed since their defeat. Disguising itself as a "victim," Japan has kicked up a racket against the DPRK. Not content with this, it is now enforcing the measure to restrict and cut off even the mail exchange between the non-governmental organizations of the DPRK and Japan, etc., something one can hardly imagine with normal thinking power in the present IT age. The Japanese authorities are stoking extreme atmosphere hostile to the DPRK throughout Japan by intensifying the politically motivated suppression and social enmity towards the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Japan is persisting in such political swindle as evading the redemption of its past wrongs and distorting the history and pursuing so malignant false propaganda and hostile policy towards the DPRK though it is well aware its behavior is bound to invite protest and denunciation from the international community. The aim sought by it through these moves is to revive at any cost "Imperial Japan" which stooped to any infamy as the leader of Asia 60 odd years back. 
					
					 The Korean people are shaking with towering grudge and resentment against Japan. They will certainly force it to pay for its crimes generation after generation.
					
					 Japan had better properly redeem all its crimes committed throughout its history before it is too late.

articles.title: Palhae's Specialties Famous in World
articles.content:
Palhae's Specialties Famous in World
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Palhae (698-926), the proud successor to Koguryo, was well known in the world for its specialties.
					 Among them, according to old records, are tangle of the South Sea, soybean malt of Chaeksong, deer of Puyo, pig of Makhil, horse of Solbin, hemp cloth of Hyonju, silk of Ryongju, iron of Wisong, rice of Rosong, goldfish of the Lake Mitha, plum of Hwando and pear of Rakyu.
					
					 Bronze and fur goods of Palhae enjoyed a great popularity.
					
					 The goods made with fur of sable, tiger, leopard, bear, white rabbit and other animals were exported in a big way not only to Tang and Japan, but also to central and west Asian countries.
					
					 Renowned also were porcelains of various kinds, sizes, shapes, colors and patterns, gem stones of various kinds and their processed goods and quality building stones.
					
					 A chest made with hwaok (a red gem stone), songphungsok (a transparent stone) and mano (a pink and white gem stone) was highly praised by foreigners for its artistic delicacy, formative gracefulness and substantial utility.
					
					 Toys were main specialty, too.
					
					 Many books, exclusively introducing Palhae's specialties, were on sale in Tang at that time.
					
					 This shows Palhae had an economy developed in all fields including agriculture, stockbreeding, handicraft, fruit farming and fishery.

articles.title: Final Offensive Operation for Liberation of Country
articles.content:
Final Offensive Operation for Liberation of Country
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- August 15 is a significant day when the Korean nation was liberated from the colonial yoke of Japan.
					 Greeting the anniversary every year, the Korean people with deep emotion recollect the immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung, the anti-Japanese legendary hero, who led the final offensive operation for national liberation to victory and defeated the Japanese imperialist robbers in August Juche 34 (1945).
					
					 Entering 1945, a positive offensive operation of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and a nation-wide resistance combined with the former were launched in accordance with the final offensive operational plan that the President had worked out in detail with his sharp penetration into the rapidly changing political situation in which the Japanese imperialists were faced with the crisis of final doom.
					
					 The battle formation of the KPRA units was rearranged and fine military and political workers were appointed chiefs in charge of major cities and regions. The President planned to personally advance into Pyongyang and the South Phyongan Provincial area to command the general operation.
					
					 Being assigned to the task of assault prior to the final offensive, the members of the KPRA simultaneously raided various strategic points of the enemy in the night of August 8, thus creating favorable conditions for breaking through the enemy's frontier fortresses at a blow.
					
					 On August 9 an order of general offensive was issued to the units of the KPRA.
					
					The KPRA units, which had taken the Kanbaeksan secret camp as offensive position for the final operation, waged battles to seize various provinces together with small units, groups and national resistance organizations active in the homeland.
					
					 The units on the Tuman River broke through the enemy's frontier fortresses in a twinkle and liberated the Kyongwon and Kyonghung areas. They continued to expand battle results towards Sonbong, liberating broader areas of the country.
					
					 Some units, acting as an advance party of the landing force, landed at Sonbong and advanced to the area of Chongjin.
					
					 After liberating Jinchang, Dongning, Muling and Mudanjiang, other units gave fatal blows to the Kwantung Army, pursuing the enemy troops and arrived on the other side of the Tuman River.
					
					 The Rajin People's Armed Corps liberated Rajin and the Kkachibong Armed Corps Hoeryong by its own efforts.
					
					 The resistance organizations in South Hamgyong Province stormed and destroyed many police stations and other ruling organs of the enemy prior to the advance of the KPRA units. The resistance organizations in Cholwon and Popdong in Kangwon Province and in Yomju and Sakju in North Phyongan Province also fought bravely to control the enemy.
					
					 Thanks to the bold offensive of the KPRA and courageous fight of the people's resistance organizations of the country combined with the former, the Japanese imperialists surrendered unconditionally on August 15, 1945, a week after the operation against Japan started.
					
					 At last the cause of national liberation for which the Korean nation had eagerly longed was realized brilliantly under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung who led the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory, going through the grim ordeals and difficulties for 20 years.

articles.title: Japan's Crime Obstructing Korean Reunification
articles.content:
Japan's Crime Obstructing Korean Reunification
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The sinful history of Japan records its crimes of obstructing the reunification of Korea in a vicious way.
					 The Japanese reactionaries included in the paragraph 3 of an "agreement" concluded with south Korea in Juche 54 (1965) that the south Korean "government" is the "legitimate one" in the Korean Peninsula. In return, the unheard-of crimes committed by Japan against the Korean nation during its protracted colonial rule were nullified and a way was opened for reinvading Korea.
					
					 When the joint statement between the north and the south was issued on July 4, 1972 on the basis of the three principles of national reunification, the Japanese reactionaries with malicious intention not only openly slandered the three principles of national reunification but also viciously opposed it. At the end of speaking ill of the three principles of national reunification, the then Japanese ambassador to south Korea did not hesitate to make reckless remarks that Japan wants division of Korea because the tragedy of Korea's reunification is greater than that of division.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have been engaged in slandering various reunification proposals of the DPRK including the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, the proposal for converting the Korean Peninsula into nuclear-free peace zone and the proposal for wholesale disarmament in the Korean Peninsula and praised sky-high the separatist line of south Korea. When the south Korean authorities issued the separatist "July 7 declaration", Japan fully welcomed and supported it before anyone else, describing it as "way" for Korea's reunification and also undertook the role of "bridge" for the "northern policy" of the U.S.
					
					 Besides, they came out with a "conditional invitation" at several UN general assembly sessions including the 20th General Assembly in an attempt to prevent the DPRK representative from participating in and resorted to base means of bribing others for the purpose. They cunningly maneuvered not to disorganize the "UN Commission on the Unification and Rehabilitation of Korea", a tool of aggression, that the U.S. had concocted by usurping the name of the United Nations.
					
					 Even today after half a century has passed, the Japanese reactionaries are hell bent on sanction and pressure of the DPRK, availing themselves of the U.S. hostile policy against it, and thus are committing double and treble crimes against the Korean nation.

articles.title: Japanese Imperialists' Vicious Attempt to Obliterate Korean Language
articles.content:
Japanese Imperialists' Vicious Attempt to Obliterate Korean Language
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists had tried in a vicious way to obliterate the Korean language during their 40-odd-year-long colonial fascist rule over Korea in the first half of the 20th century.
					Under the slogan of making the Korean people the subjects of the Japanese king, the invaders formed a powerful system in an attempt to utterly obliterate the Korean language. For this, they mobilized not only the administrative and police organs such as the "government-general in Korea", provincial, county and sub-county offices, police station, police substation and police box and even gendarme.
					
					 At the first stage of the "governor-general's" rule the Japanese language was announced as the mother tongue of the Korean people and a system under which those on the level of the provincial governor should work out and submit a "report on short course of mother tongue (Japanese language)" from November 1912 was established. The "government-general" adopted a directive on organizing Japanese language training schools in an extensive way from 1938 and forcibly implemented it. As a result the number of such schools amounted to more than 3,660 at the end of that year.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists fabricated the "Newspaper Law" in 1907 and "Publication Law" in 1909 to repress the publication of newspapers in Korea in every way. In 1910 they promulgated the "Publication Regulations" to intensify the obliteration of the Korean people's national character and national language.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists, who worked out the "Bill on the Revision of Education in Korea" on April 11, 1905, faked up and revised for the worse the "Directive on Education in Korea" in 1911, 1922 and 1938. By so doing, they had pushed ahead with the obliteration of the Korean language in the field of education in a vicious way and made no scruple to brutally suppress the students speaking in Korean.
					
					 They also laid a legal foundation for justifying the criminal "campaign to change Koreans' names to Japanese ones" and set up a system for suppressing those opposing it so as to push forward the campaign.
					
					 The campaign was a brutal mental torture imposed upon the Korean people and a pernicious crime against them.
					
					 The efforts of the Japanese imperialists to obliterate the Korean language under the name of "one and the same ancestry and roots" and "oneness of Japan and Korea" after they occupied Korea by force of arms were the most villainous criminal acts unprecedented in brigandish and vicious nature.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Entirely to Blame for Bedeviled Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Entirely to Blame for Bedeviled Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group, a group of wicked traitors, has been hell-bent on the moves against the DPRK and reunification. It is entirely to blame for having driven to the worst phase the inter-Korean relations which made dynamic progress after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Minju Joson Friday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It cites facts to prove that the Lee group totally denied the historic north-south joint declarations and has persistently shunned their implementation and frantically staged maneuvers for a war of aggression against the north and hatched plots against it, labeling fellow compatriots "an enemy."
					
					 What is intolerable is that the group is becoming so brazen-faced as to try to cover up its crimes against the nation and reunification, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 Some days ago the puppet Ministry of Unification released "2009 White Paper on Unification." In this white paper the group let loose a whole string of sheer sophism that it "made efforts to ensure" peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and improve the inter-Korean relations in the last one year and 2008 was "a period of adjustment for establishing new south-north relations." This patently indicates how brazen-faced the group of traitors has become to falsify truth and evade the responsibility for having bedeviled the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 But such cynical rhetoric can never convince anyone just as one can hardly get the sun eclipsed by palms.
					
					The Lee group's noisy trumpeting to evade the blame for having bedeviled the inter-Korean relations would only strip bare their true colors as incompetents and liars.

articles.title: Release of Arrested Evacuees Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Arrested Evacuees Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The All-people Measure Committee against the Brutal Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Aug. 11, demanding that the puppet authorities immediately release the evacuees in Ryongsan who have been detained for the reason that they conducted a struggle to defend their right to existence.  
					 In a press release, the organization referred to the fact that the Seoul Central District Court is staging a trial of six evacuees detained under the accusation of "interference in the fulfillment of special duties."
					
					 Noting that the evacuees' struggle was just and they are innocent of such "charge", the organization urged the prosecution authorities to open to the public the investigation records.
					
					 The petition calling for their release has been signed by 250,000 members of different organizations and citizens, it said, contending that the authorities should set free the evacuees at once.
					
					 At the end of the press conference, representatives of the organization presented the petition to the Seoul Central District Court.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities Urged to Settle Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities Urged to Settle Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The "preparatory committee for August 15 rally" made up of at least 100 civic and public organizations including the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Peasants Associations and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on August 10 to demand the puppet authorities immediately opt to settle the inter-Korean relations.
					 A press release read out at the press conference accused the Lee Myung Bak "government" of putting up watchwords "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" and persistently pursuing the policy of totally negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, thus bringing the inter-Korean relations to the phase of collapse. 
					
					 It urged the Lee regime to make clear its will to respect the inter-Korean joint declaration and implement it with Aug. 15 as a momentum. 
					
					 It also demanded the Lee regime immediately give up its full participation in the PSI, a threat to the north, cancel the projected Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, aimed at invading the north, and pull out of the south Korea-U.S. "military alliance".
					
					 The Lee regime should halt the fascist suppression being perpetrated on charges of violation of "the National Security Law", release the unreasonably detained democratic and pro-reunification figures and ensure cooperation and exchange between the south and the north, it demanded, adding:
					
					 We will use the "August 15 rally" for judging the Lee Myung Bak group for deteriorating the people's living, violating democracy and fostering the inter-Korean confrontation.

articles.title: Normalization of Japan-DPRK Relations Urged
articles.content:
Normalization of Japan-DPRK Relations Urged
 Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A national general meeting of "the Liaison Council for Demanding Denuclearization and Peace in North East Asia and Normalization of the Relations between Japan and the DPRK" was held in Tokyo on July 24. 
					 Present at the meeting were figures of the council and organizations for friendship between Japan and the DPRK in different parts of Japan. 
					
					 Koichi Ishizaka, co-representative and secretary general of the council, in his report informed the participants of the activities conducted by the council last year in demand of the government's lifting of its sanctions against the DPRK, stop to the suppression of Koreans in Japan, etc. and proposed tasks to be fulfilled by the council in the future. 
					
					 He noted that the council is faced with the tasks to build up public opinion calling for Japan's settlement of its past crimes, open a meeting for the normalization of the relations between Japan and the DPRK and consolidate the liaison council and request the Japanese government to ensure the basic rights of the Koreans in Japan and recognize their right to national education, etc. 
					
					 There was a report on the activities of organizations for friendship between Japan and the DPRK and the results of the election of officials of the council were made public at the meeting. 
					
					 A lecture on the situation on the Korean Peninsula was also given there. 
					
					 An appeal was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Demandan a Japon liquidar todos sus crimenes historicos
articles.content:
Demandan a Japon liquidar todos sus crimenes historicos
 Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 64o aniversario de la derrota del imperialismo japones en la Segunda Guerra Mundial, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por Medidas de Indemnizacion a ex "Consoladoras" para el Ejercito Japones y Victimas de Reclutamiento Forzoso, hizo publica el dia 14 una declaracion.
					 Impotentes de descargar su rencor anegado en sangre, vibran todavia de colera numerosas victimas, quienes en el siglo pasado, habian sufrido afrentas y penalidades de todo tipo siendo esclavas sexuales de las tropas agresoras japonesas, esclavas de trabajo y carne de canon en la guerra.
					
					Por otra parte, no pocos miembros de la nueva generacion sufren tormentas fisicas por los efectos de armas quimicas que los imperialistas japoneses botaron al descuido en muchas partes de Asia.
					
					Ademas, muchas personas viven tan angustiadas durante varios decenios por no poder averiguar el paradero de sus parientes que resultaron desaparecidos tras trasladarse a las tierras foraneas a punta de bayonetas del imperialismo japones.
					
					Pese a esta realidad, las autoridades japonesas actuan descaradamente repitiendo la insistencia absurda de que el problema de liquidacion del pasado criminal fue "solucionado" ya en lo juridico, la cual no reconocen las victimas ni la sociedad internacional
					
					Hasta la fecha a mas de 60 anos de su derrota, las autoridades japonesas, que han venido eludiendo obstinadamente pedir disculpas e indemnizar a Corea, pais perjudicado mas que otros por los imperialistas japoneses, desarrollan al contrario la campana contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea haciendose las "victimas".
					
					Como si esto fuera poco, incurren en la locura inimaginable con el normal modo de pensar en la actual era de informatizacion como tomar medidas para restringir y bloquear el intercambio de correos entre las entidades civiles de la RPDC y Japon.
					
					 Ultimamente, fomentan en todo el territorio japones el extremado clima hostil a Corea recrudeciendo la represion politica y la presion social contra la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y los coreanos radicados en Japon.
					
					 Hoy dia, a sabiendas de que es objeto de protestas y condenas de la sociedad internacional, Japon recurre con teson a las estafas politicas como la evasion de la liquidacion del pasado criminal y la tergiversacion de la historia y practica la demagogia y la politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					Todo esto parte del objetivo de reconstruir a toda costa el "gran imperio japones" que hace mas de 60 anos cometia las arbitrariedades de todo tipo actuando como dueno de Asia.
					
					El pueblo coreano guarda profundo rencor y odio a ese pais isleno y cobrara sin falta su precio de generacion en generacion.
					
					Japon debe liquidar correctamente todos sus crimenes historicos antes de que se haga tarde.

articles.title: Crimenes de Japon que obstaculizo la reunificacion de Corea
articles.content:
Crimenes de Japon que obstaculizo la reunificacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ATCC) -- En la historia criminal de Japon contra Corea estan registrados tambien los crimenes que obstaculizaron perversamente la reunificacion de Corea.
					Los reaccionarios japoneses, al firmar el "acuerdo" en el 54 (1965) de la Era Juche con el Sur de Corea, anotaron en el tercer articulo de tal "convenio" que el "gobierno legitimo" en la Peninsula Coreana es el "poder" surcoreano y, a costa de eso, invalidaron sus crimenes sin precedentes perpetrados contra la nacion coreana durante la larga dominacion colonial sobre Corea y dejaron abierto el camino para realizar nueva agresion a esta.
					
					Cuando fue publicada el 4 de julio de 1972 la historica Declaracion Conjunta entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea a base de los tres principios de la reunificacion de la patria, ellos denigraron abiertamente y rechazaron perversamente esos principios. Entonces, el embajador japones acreditado en el Sur de Corea los censuro de tal o cual manera y dijo que "Japon desea la division porque la tragedia de la reunificacion de Corea es mas grande que la de la division".
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses calumniaron tambien el proyecto de la fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo, la propuesta de creacion de la zona desnuclearizada y de paz en la Peninsula Coreana, la de desarme de gran envergadura en esta region y otros proyectos para la reunificacion de Corea y preconizaron activamente la linea divisoria del Sur de Corea. Tan pronto como las autoridades surcoreanas publicaron la declaracion "7 de julio" de caracter divisorio, Japon la apoyo primeramente como si esa fuera un supuesto "medio" para la reunificacion de Corea y se encargo del papel de "puente" de la "politica sobre el Norte" de EE.UU.
					
					 Tambien, presento el "proyecto de invitacion condicional" para que no participara el representante de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la 20a asamblea general y otras asambleas generales de la ONU y actuo vilmente malgastando el dinero para llevarlo a cabo. Tambien, en la asamblea general de la ONU maniobro taimadamente para que no se disuelva la "Comision de la ONU para la unificacion y rehabilitacion de Corea", aparato de agresion inventado por EE.UU. abusando del nombre de la ONU.
					
					 Hasta la fecha en que paso el medio siglo, los reaccionarios japoneses recurren freneticamente a las maniobras para aplicar la sancion y presion contra la RPDC adhiriendose a la politica hostil a esta de EE.UU. y multiplican sus crimenes contra la nacion coreana.

articles.title: ATCC comenta teoria de ataque preventivo nuclear de Japon
articles.content:
ATCC comenta teoria de ataque preventivo nuclear de Japon
 Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ATCC) -- En una rueda de prensa concedida el dia 9 el premier japones Aso preconizo abiertamente tal teoria.
					 El dijo que negar el ataque preventivo nuclear "no es real" en la garantia de la seguridad de Japon.
					
					 En una palabra, es que la seguridad de este pais isleno reside en el ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					 La palabra de Aso demuestra fehacientemente que  se torna mas realista y grave la amenaza nuclear de Japon sobre los paises vecinos y el resto del mundo.
					
					 El pais isleno esta protegido por el "paraguas nuclear" de Estados Unidos y dispone no solo del combustible nuclear sino  tambien  de las tecnicas de fabricacion de las armas nucleares y medios de su transporte 
					
					 Esto significa que Japon ya esta plenamente armado con  las armas nucleares.
					
					 A base de esto, los reaccionarios japoneses tratan de tomar el camino de la guerra nuclear mas aventurera.
					
					 Tambien, la palabra de Aso vuelve a demostrar claramente la absurdidad y la peligrosidad de la insistencia de EE.UU. y otros paises en que la posesion nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea azuza a Japon a la posesion  nuclear.
					
					 El rumor de la "reaccion en cadena" de la posesion  nuclear, de que debido a la de la RPDC, Japon saldra en el futuro al armamento nuclear, es erronea desde su premisa logica.
					
					 El armamento nuclear de Japon no es cosa del futuro sino la del presente. Por lo tanto, resulta absurdo tal rumor de "reaccion en cadena" basada en la premisa injusta.
					
					 Cuando recrudece la aspiracion de la humanidad al mundo desnuclearizado, Japon esta preso del fanatismo de la guerra nuclear, lo cual es el producto directo de doble rasero que aplican  EE.UU. y otros paises en el tratamiento del problema nuclear.
					
					 Estos aplican el doble rasero en este problema con la sofisteria no cientifica como el rumor de la "reaccion en cadena" en la posesion nuclear, pero, no pueden liberarse de la responsabilidad de que Japon  llega a hablar  del ataque preventivo nuclear como hoy.
					
					 Hasta la fecha cuando este pais isleno habla abiertamente de la teoria de ataque preventivo nuclear y perpetra abiertamente la amenaza nuclear contra la RPDC y otros paises vecinos, ellos no dicen ni un pio del particular.
					
					 El "problema nuclear del Norte de Corea" no fue inventado a base de alguna imparcialidad sino segun la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU. tendente a aplastar a esta.
					
					 Las conversaciones a 6 bandas se fracasaron por tales desigualdades: algun pais puede insistir en el ataque preventivo nuclear y el otro debe ser obligado a la renuncia nuclear.
					
					 La situacion de hoy demuestra elocuentemente cuan justas son las medidas de la RPDC sobre la posesion del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo y la retirada de las conversaciones a 6 bandas y cuan clave es la renuncia de la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU. en la solucion del problema nuclear.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia la banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ATCC) -- El autor, que llevo al estado peor las relaciones Norte-Sur que avanzaban favorablemente despues de publicar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, es la banda de Lee Myung Bak y otros traidores que recurren con frenesi a las maquinaciones anti-RPDC y anti-reunificacion.
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este viernes y prosigue:
					
					 La banda de Lee niega totalmente las historicas declaraciones Norte-Sur y elude obstinadamente su ejecucion. Se entrega freneticamente a las maniobras belicas y tejemanejes intrigantes contra el Norte de Corea calificandolo del "enemigo".
					
					Ademas, esta banda actua descaradamente para encubrir sus crimenes anti-nacion y anti-reunificacion.
					
					Hace poco, el ministerio titere de Reunificacion, en su "carta blanca de la reunificacion para 2009" alego que ellos mismos "hicieron esfuerzos" en 2008 para asegurar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y "mejorar" las relaciones intercoreanas y agrego que 2008 fue el "periodo de coordinacion para establecer las nuevas relaciones Sur-Norte", lo cual demuestra fehacientemente el cinismo de la banda anti-reunificacion para evadir la responsabilidad de haber fracasado las relaciones intercoreanas induciendo en error la verdad.
					
					Pero, esto cinismo no puede convencer a nadie como si no pudiera cubrir el sol con la palma de la mano.
					
					La banda de Lee habla tanto para liberarse de su responsabilidad de haber llevado al fracaso las relaciones Norte-Sur, pero, revelara solo su naturaleza manchada de incapacidad y falsedad.
